import React, { useContext, useRef, useState } from 'react' import Topbar from "../../component/Topbar/Topbar" import Sidebar from "../../component/Sidebar/Sidebar" import "./CreatePost.css" import { PermMedia } from '@mui/icons-material' import { AuthContext } from '../../context/AuthContext' function CreatePost() { const [file, setFile] = useState(null) const desc = useRef() const link = useRef() const { user } = useContext(AuthContext) const submitHandler = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() const Post = { userId: user.user._id, desc: desc.current.value } console.log(file) } return ( <>
setFile(e.target.files[0])} style={{ display: "none" }} />
{/*

Separated link

) } export default CreatePost
